venti.name: Venti
venti.storytext:
"As the four seasons in turn shall say their piece, so the four winds too shall never cease. 
"Of course, to look at it differently, I am the one who should be credited here, and not they."
Credits should be given where credits belong ‚Äî if not for the bard who pens the song, then who shall ensure that these tales are passed on!?"
venti.source: Reward for inviting Venti to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Havoc: Obliteration
skills.descriptionraw: Performs different attacks based on the current stance that <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1204]</color> is in.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Ranged Stance - Flash of Havoc: </color>Deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE_4] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], reclaim 2 $[K310], and apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112043]</color> to the target character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melee Stance - Light of Obliteration</color>: Deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].
skills.descriptionreplaced: Performs different attacks based on the current stance that <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tartaglia</color> is in.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Ranged Stance - Flash of Havoc: </color>Deal 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>, reclaim 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>, and apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>Riptide</color> to the target character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melee Stance - Light of Obliteration</color>: Deal 7 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.
skills.description:
Performs different attacks based on the current stance that Tartaglia is in.
Ranged Stance - Flash of Havoc: Deal 4 Hydro DMG, reclaim 2 Energy, and apply Riptide to the target character.
Melee Stance - Light of Obliteration: Deal 7 Hydro DMG.
